description: ðŸš¨AMAZON'S AI CHECKOUT ISNâ€™T THAT SMART- 1,000 INDIANS ARE WATCHING  Amazon's "Just Walk Out" technology, enabling customers to shop without traditional checkout, reportedly involves significant human input alongside AI.   Despite employing sensors and deep learning for seamless shopping experiences, over 1,000 workers in India reportedly play a crucial role in reviewing transactions.  Source: USA Today
